name: Ativeil
description: Ativeil is a fun and interesting 3D puzzle game. Cubes, lasers, teddy bears... this game has them all. Can you figure it out ?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Dual Core 1.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 750, Radeon R7 240, 1GB VRAM, Shader Model 5.0 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: *IntelÂ® HD Graphics not supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 1070, Radeon RX 570, 4 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
